segments.text: There is a problem in my apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A pipe broke in my wall , and water is leaking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is the water causing any damage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it ’ s creating mildew on the walls .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I won ’ t be able to fix the pipe until tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can call a plumber to fix it right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll do it for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you can ’ t do it until tomorrow , and I need it fixed now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re okay with me calling someone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m all right with that .
segments.speaker: S2
